Frequently Asked Questions

Who is Per Head Lab?

Per Head Lab is an experienced sportsbook software provider that offers one of the best bookie software in the industry. With thousands of players online, we are confident that we know about this business. We are located in San José, Costa Rica.

What are your hours of operation?

We are open 24/7, every day of the year. Per Head Lab is always ready to help our customers with their needs and solve any issues that may arise during the service.

What sports and events do you offer?

We offer almost all sports and events! If it is out there we offer it. And in case we don’t offer it and you need it, let us know and we will set it up for you.

Is there a minimum number of players required to start with us?

No, there is not… You can get started with just one player. There is no minimum. You will find a package specially designed for your needs.

Do you have a demo or test account?

Yes we do. You can start now by asking us for demos accounts for both the agent and player websites.

Do I get my own website?

Your players and agents can bet on our default websites at no additional charge, and we also have different packages that you can choose from to have your own custom website built.

How do I send funds to my bookie account?

You can send funds to Per Head Lab through Western Union and Money Gram. Credit cards are not accepted.

What do you consider an active account?

An account is considered active if it has a graded wager on it. It does not matter if the player calls to customer service with a question or logs in on the website but does not wager. Only graded wagers are considered active players

Do I get charged for non active players?

No, You are only charged for active players on a weekly basis.

How soon can I start?

We can get you up and running with a basic set-up in less than 24 hours.

Do you have mobile services?

Yes, We have developed our own mobile multi-platform where your clients and agents can access from any mobile device.

Can I have my own rules for my players?

Yes, you can change anything. We will make the changes to Restrictions and Rules for you.
